participant_1.name: Arthur
participant_1.personality: outgoing and quirky, with a fondness for unusual hobbies.
participant_1.background: I won the spelling bee in third grade. I smoke a pipe. I have been married five times. I love to eat eggplant.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and introspective, with a passion for storytelling.
participant_2.background: My favorite tv show is game of thrones. I like long walks on the beach. My favorite color is blue. My favorite music genre is pop. I enjoy home cooked meals.
